割蓆聲明
我們現正宣佈與李國永(David/lunch哥/握狗男)與其支持者正式割蓆。我們從今以後再冇關係。李國永與其支持者嘅行為已經令到抗爭風氣敗壞。李國永罪狀罄竹難書，以下只屬於一小部份。
李國永重大罪狀：
1.周梓樂祭壇前玩汽水撚狗，對死者極不尊重。
2.性騷擾女手足，將自己條J send俾人睇。
3.膠化抗爭，用佢所謂嘅行為藝術同埋活動令到運動成為一場笑話。
4.自稱全香港最成功勇武，開咗個全港最大勇武公海，喺裏面自以為指揮幫人安排職位同埋更表。
5. 大搞個人崇拜，成立左一個星級團隊。
6. 與香港警方合作，報警備案捉手足。
7. telegram/Instagram一言堂獨裁，巔峰時期一日300個ban。對抗爭毫無幫助。
8.喺工程巴囚車面前搞事，令到其家人冇得送車。
9.唔聽意見，所有批評/比建議佢嘅人都會俾佢屈做藍屍以及分化撚。
佢嘅行為從不代表抗爭者。佢只係使用呢場運動令到自己更出名。佢同佢嘅支持者從支持佢報警捉手足嗰一刻已經再唔係我哋嘅手足。從佢哋選擇原諒以及尊重香港警察嗰一刻已經成為左政權嘅走狗。黃絲唔係唔使認錯嘅藉口。
與其話我哋令到一個蠢人出名，佢係已經靠蠢出咗名。
從我哋心底裏講一句屌你。
English Version
We would like to announce that we distance ourselves from Li Kwok Wing David (Lunch Gor/The One that side with Hong Kong Popo) and his followers from now on. We announce that we would cut all ties with them. What David has done in the past has damaged the reputation of the movement and those supporting him have been pouring fuel on the fire. David has committed many sins, so many that we cannot mention all of it as it will take too long.
Here's a quick recap of important ones:
1. Play with coca-cola in front of the memorial of Chow Tze Lok to trigger the cops with no respect to Chow so he could get attention.
2. Sent pictures of his dick to our female comrades.
3. Make the protest movement into one big joke by his so-called Performance Art and events.
4. Self proclaims himself as the "best valiant" and gave orders to other comrades.
5. Starting a personal cult by forming the "David's stardom protest squad"
6. Collaborated with the Hong Kong Popo to remove his opponents/opposition.
7. Dictatorship in his telegram channel and Instagram, anyone opposing him or giving him opinions to improve would be shamed as paid actors and an immediate ban. The peak of banning 300 people a day. This is in no means a way to fight for freedom.
8. Blocking a prison car outside of court, causing everyone to be removed from the scene and made the families of a protester to miss the chance to give him a farewell.
9. Refusing to listen to advice, everyone who gave him advice is being ignored
His actions are in no way representing the movement. He is just using the movement as a tool to make himself famous. He and his supporters are no longer our comrades when he decided to collaborate with the Hong Kong Popo to remove one of our comrades who criticized him publicly, with the supporters supporting this action. They have chosen to be dogs of the regime when he decides to forgive and collaborate with the Popo and to give them respect, which they don't deserve. Being yellow is no excuse for his wrongdoings.
We are not making someone stupid famous, he is famous for being stupid already.
Sincerely, fuck you, from the bottom of our hearts.
